x_snc_team_meeting.agenda:
1. ACR -- Inconsistency Easy to handle outliers but outstanding
in organisations, exceptional or high performance is something that doesn't happen every day. Most people are effective. That is, they perform their job how it is meant to be performed.
Template: Mediocre Doing your job well with the quality and timeliness ensured. Ideation without implementation is day dreaming without any purpose.
Effective Along with doing your job well in time and quality, have you walked an extra mile to set a benchmark on the factors you have control on? like, 1. Work smart by automating the routine and save man-hours or cost to the company? 2. Try to question the status quo? Persistent in trying different ideas and rejoice the failure? 3. Ideator love to implement and mad of getting the adaption 3. Rigor to leave a mark that would help enhance or reshape your identity?
Challenge me with data... cross your heart and claim your authority... actions... actions and actions!
2. Budget for RcR Improvements In-line code linting support Design to Productize Upgrade Skipped entries into RcR Extending it to new code types Enhancing new rules and per instance rule customization
3. Looping in my managers into the email conversation is ok?
